tool_description: Analyzes ingredient safety for hair and scalp, checking for harmful chemicals, allergens, and interactions with existing conditions or treatments.

scalp_condition.description: Current scalp condition: healthy, sensitive, irritated, or damaged

error_messages: Empty ingredient list: At least one ingredient must be provided
Invalid ingredient format: All ingredients must be non-empty text strings
Too many ingredients: Maximum 30 ingredients can be analyzed at once
Invalid scalp condition: Must be one of [healthy, sensitive, irritated, damaged]
Unrecognized ingredient: Some ingredients could not be identified in safety database
usage: Provide list of ingredients to analyze. Optionally specify known sensitivities and current scalp condition. Returns safety assessment with risk levels and alternatives for problematic ingredients.

overall_safety_rating.description: Overall safety level: safe, moderate_concern, high_concern, or avoid
